title: aduvum sholluvaaL
sahitya:
aduvum sholluvAL innum anEkam sholluvAl avL mElE kuTram ennaDi

aDiyE pODi 

(aduvum)



anupallavi



madiyai nadi aNaiyum vaidIshan nATTin patiyAna murugEshan

sheida kAriyattikku 

(aduvum)



caraNam



ennEramum ingE vandu naghai enrum uDai enrum iraval kETTa nAL

pOccE

ennakkediriyAga avaL sannakkArai iTTa mettai vIDuNDAccE

unnata munnatamAga kaTTilAccu mettaiyAccu uyarnda mahamal teNDu

paTTu puDavayumAccu

tannaiviDa bhAgyashAli kiDayAden-rennamAccu taniyE irundadu pOit

tAdimArgal uNDAccu 

(aduvum)
